turns.text: Okay Uh do you want to go ahead or -
turns.label: o

turns.text: Oh sure Uh well I uh went to school at Madison for two years and they are really big on womens rights
turns.label: na

turns.text: And so I Ive seen lot of like rallies and things like that But uh Im not that liberated I mean my mom is kind of old-fashioned you know
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So I you know you pick up some traits from her and stuff But uh I think its I think its interesting and better for women to see that theres more more of them doing mens fields I like to see that And --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- I dont like to see women you know like waiting on men hand and foot but you know I I believe in like sharing and doing things for each other
I do too I like the idea I see lot more uh - my children I have five children and theyre all married
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And uh I love seeing the men help the women so much
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And they both cooperate together on - I think its great
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh me too I hope that happens to me someday I mean I I dont mind -- -- doing stuff Uh I have boyfriend and I got to make him dinner and stuff but you know I hell help me do the dishes I dont want to you know --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- expect to help to clean up then after Yeah
Ive always taught my men that They better clean up with their women and help them If they did that you know -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And theyre theyre good about it But it is neat to see them all work together And --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- big thing that I see All that most of the most of the women getting married now uh go back have gone back to you know - they they stay at work or go back to work Or whatever
And I believe well see lot more - in companies Theyre having fit about how little there are
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And I think well see lot more Dont you Of upper management
turns.label: qy^g

turns.text: And uh and I think black women now - i- in fact I work at high school
turns.label: sv

turns.label: sd

turns.text: Theyre moving them up and theyre sharp and they - so youre going to see lot lot more of that in leadership I believe
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah I like to see that I think its uh really neat to see and all that educated minority uh person --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- who really knows what theyre talking about And --
-- its just too bad that some people you know still look down on them just because of their color You know
Yeah But they wouldnt know what theyre doing
turns.label: b

turns.text: But Im not big on subserving as far as --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But I never have gone along with that you know Even far back But I was brought up pretty good in home that - years ago my mother was that way The same - I - my bo- - ther- you know - some people say oh the boys shouldnt have to do those jobs The inside jobs But we never were taught - they had to do as much as we did So that was good
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So thats I think thats good To keep the equal as far as as uh not nex- nex- uh necessarily by sex type thing
